tower

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • tower.Tower
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicTower, DogTower, ElectricTower, GhostTower, KingTower, LegendaryTower, MageTower, TreeTower, VolcanoTower

    public abstract class Tower
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an abstract class for an ingame tower
    Author:
    Sean
